authors.name: Zach Sanders
authors.bio: Zach has 8+ years in performance marketing. Formerly at HubSpot and a D2C ecom brand. He's scaled content channels to millions of views.

authors.name: Lamrin
authors.bio: Full-stack engineer building AI-powered tools. Lamrin architected ContHunt's video analysis engine and loves breaking down complex tech into simple ideas.

authors.name: Elena
authors.bio: Elena leads marketing at ContHunt. With a background in content strategy for B2B SaaS, she helps brands tell stories that actually convert.

authors.name: Alex
authors.bio: Alex is a content creator with 500K+ followers across TikTok and YouTube. He breaks down what makes videos go viral and teaches creators how to replicate those patterns.

authors.name: Maya
authors.bio: Maya analyzes social media trends for a living. She tracks what's working across platforms and helps brands spot opportunities before they go mainstream.
